metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14348 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibRaw before 0.18.4 has a heap-based Buffer Overflow in the processCanonCameraInfo function via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14348` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.5-1
libraw23 - 0.18.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
kodi package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.5-1').
rawtherapee package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
